sense.def:
To throw something
pomeni, da nekaj, kar držimo v roki, s hitrim gibom zalučamo.

seg.quote: Roger picked up a stone and threw it at Henry.

sense.def:
To throw something into a place or position
pomeni povzročiti, da nekaj pade nekam.

seg.quote: Tom undressed in the dark, throwing his clothes carelessly over a chair.
The train braked violently, throwing everyone to the floor.

sense.def:
To throw a part of one's body somewhere
pomeni del telesa naglo in s precej sile premakniti nekam.

seg.quote: She threw her arms around his neck.
He threw himself on his bed.

sense.def:
Kadar konj
throws its rider
, se premakne tako, da jezdec pade z njega.

To throw someone into an unpleasant situation
pomeni nenadoma povzročiti, da se nekdo znajde v neprijetnem položaju.

seg.quote: The thought of being late would throw her into a state of panic.
The Depression had thrown almost everybody out of work.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
throws light or shadow on something
, je zaradi tistega nekaj drugega osvetljeno ali v senci.

seg.quote: A spotlight threw a pool of violet light onto the stage.

gramGrp.pos:
REFL VB
or
VB
with
OBJ,
with
‘into’

sense.def:
To throw oneself into an activity
pomeni zelo dejavno in navdušeno nekaj početi.

cit.quote: vreči se v kaj, zagnati se, vneto se lotiti

seg.quote: Mrs Kaul threw herself into her work heart and soul.
Many women throw all of their energies into a career.

sense.def:
To throw a fit or tantrum
pomeni nenadoma se začeti vesti neobvladano.

seg.quote: She threw a fit of hysterics.
It was the fact that she was married that threw me.

sense.def:
To throw away
pomeni znebiti se nečesa, česar ne želimo.

seg.quote: She likes to keep things, even old things, rather than throw them away.

sense.def:
To throw away
pomeni ne izkoristiti nekaj dobrega, kar imamo.

Kadar prodajalec kupcu
throws in something
, mu h kupljenemu doda še nekaj zastonj.

To throw something out
pomeni znebiti se nečesa.

seg.quote: The broken cooking pots were thrown out.

sense.def:
To throw someone out
pomeni prisiliti nekoga, da odide.

seg.quote: Her parents threw her out when they found she was pregnant.

sense.def:
To throw up
pomeni isto kot
to vomit
;
